data.name: World of Warships — Exclusive Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
New to World of Warships? Dip your toes in the water with a Premium battleship and a set of sweet bonuses.

This package includes:

  • Japanese Premium battleship Ishizuchi. She is perfectly balanced for a comfortable start, with high speed and impressive artillery. Premium ships come fully equipped and provide benefits such as XP conversion, no penalties for Commander transfer, etc.
  • Japanese Commander with 6 skill points. Tune your gameplay by assigning a Commander to a ship and mastering up to six different skills.
  • Main Armaments Mod I: A ship upgrade that increases survivability and accelerates repairs of the main battery and torpedo tubes.
  • Damage Control System Mod I: An upgrade that reduces the risk of flooding and fire.
  • 5x Steam containers: Exclusive boxes that grant three random items when opened.
  • 11x Steam camouflages: Unique Steam-exclusive designs.
  • 11x common expendable economic bonuses of four types (Credits +20%, Ship XP +100%, Commander XP +100%, and Free XP +300%)
  • Steam commemorative flag: Show your love for Steam with a special flag bearing its logo!
  • Port slot

Camouflages only change the ship exterior and do not provide any economic or combat bonuses.

The drop chances for the Steam container can be found here.

If you already have this ship in your Port, you will not receive any compensation for her.

The content of this DLC is only playable on World of Warships accounts created on Steam.

data.short_description: New to World of Warships? Dip your toes in the water with a Premium battleship and a set of sweet bonuses.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Czech, Japanese*, Polish*, Russian*, Thai, Turkish, Spanish - Spain, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Traditional Chinese*, Italian*, Simplified Chinese*, Ukrainian, Dutch*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.66 GHz, Core i3 2.5 GHz, AMD Athlon II X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 440/630, AMD Radeon HD 7660
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 43 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10.1
  • Additional Notes: 1280×720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 SP1 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4 GHz, AMD FX 6350 3.9 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11
  • Additional Notes: 1920×1080

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.7.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4570R
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000, Intel Iris 5100
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280×720
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920×1080
